heroTitle: Unlock Investment Potential and Fuel Business Growth
heroSubtitle: A cutting-edge platform for Crowdfunding, Crowd-investing, and an Exchange that leverages advanced technologies to connect entrepreneurs and investors.
trustedByTxt: Trusted by Leading Venture Capital Firms
investOppSub: We provide a comprehensive solution for fundraising, equity exchange, and business development. We assist businesses with securing funds and offer support throughout every stage of the process, from idea to growth.
strategicPartDesc: We collaborate with key institutions and organizations to ensure top-tier services and opportunities for our users.
restAssuredDesc: All financing and investment activities on our platform comply with Islamic Sharia law and financial regulations.
saveTROne: Streamline your investment decisions with our prebuilt analytics and research tools.
saveTRTwo: Diversify your portfolio and reduce risk.
saveTRThree: Achieve your goals with a diversified investment strategy, benefiting from transparent governance and robust risk management under the supervision of regulatory authorities.
saveTRFive: Invest in high-growth industries including AI, cybersecurity, fintech, biotech, renewable energy, and more. Gain access to a platform where entrepreneurs pitch ideas for funding and mentorship.
saveTRSeven: Invest in groundbreaking projects and small to medium-sized enterprises engaged in the latest economic trends.
saveTRNine: Support and invest in high-potential companies, helping them grow while expanding your own portfolio in innovative sectors.
supportedCompainies1: We’ve partnered with numerous businesses worldwide. Interested in joining our network of success stories?
signUpNewsSub: Stay updated with our latest news, releases, and industry insights.
careDataPolicy: We care about your privacy and data security. Read more in our privacy policy.
unInvSub: Unlock new opportunities and stay informed with expert insights and our industry-leading tools.
policySub: Our company operates under the regulatory supervision of the Capital Market Authority and the Central Bank of Saudi Arabia within the financial technology sandbox environment. For more information, please review our policies.
policyBlog1Title: Compliant with Sharia Law and Financial Regulations
policyBlog2Title: Authorized by the Capital Market Authority
policyBlog1Desc: We ensure full compliance with Islamic Sharia provisions through a dedicated Sharia board that oversees our operations, conducts reviews, and approves policies and procedures.
policyBlog2Desc: We are undergoing the necessary licensing procedures to obtain authorization from the Capital Market Authority to conduct fintech activities in the securities sector.
business_services_description: Support businesses with tailored services to increase success and efficiency.
marketplace_integration_description: Seamlessly integrate and enhance business performance across digital marketplaces.
partner_app_description: Connect with strategic partners to expand your business capabilities.
partner_portal_description: Access tools and resources to strengthen partner collaboration and drive growth.
accounts_receivable_description: Manage your finances efficiently and improve cash flow.
autopay_description: Automate payments to ensure timely transactions and reduce manual work.
customized_disbursements_description: Tailor financial distributions to meet your specific business needs.
multiple_disbursement_description: Disburse funds efficiently across multiple channels.
lending_features_description: Explore lending solutions to help businesses scale and grow.
payments_solutions_description: Secure and versatile payment options for businesses and investors.
support_description: Our team is here to assist you at every stage of your business journey.
through_partners_description: Collaborate with trusted partners to accelerate business growth.
aboutSub: Welcome to RABEH, your innovative fintech platform designed to revolutionize the connection between businesses and investors. Specializing in crowdfunding and equity exchange, RABEH empowers businesses to grow while offering investors a diverse range of opportunities.
aboutRabehSub: RABEH is dedicated to democratizing investment opportunities, making it accessible to businesses and investors globally. Our platform ensures a seamless experience for investors looking for successful ventures and entrepreneurs seeking funding.
oVSub: To become a leading fintech platform that empowers businesses and investors through advanced technology, facilitating growth and fostering success across Saudi Arabia, the MENA region, and beyond.
oMSub: To provide a secure and efficient platform that simplifies financing for businesses and enhances the investment experience using cutting-edge technologies such as artificial intelligence and blockchain.
whyCRabehSub: Explore our innovative features designed to elevate your experience and help you achieve success.
innovTechSub: Utilizing AI and blockchain to provide a seamless and secure environment for businesses and investors.
globalReachSub: Our platform connects businesses and investors worldwide, offering diverse opportunities.
entreSupportSub: Providing tools and resources to empower entrepreneurs to succeed in their ventures.
investorEmpSub: Empowering investors with a range of opportunities and data-driven insights for informed decisions.
howItWorksSub: Our platform offers fundraising, equity exchange, and business enhancement, along with support services throughout the process.
forEntreSub: Launch your campaign, attract backers, and achieve your project’s goals with the resources and funding from our platform.
forInvestorsSub: Get personalized support and expert guidance to help you navigate the investment landscape.
forConsultantsSub: Join RABEH to provide strategic advice, improve project proposals, and expand your network with entrepreneurs and investors.
advancedTechSub: Use AI and blockchain to oversee projects and track performance effectively.
aiFullSub: Our AI-powered system streamlines various processes like fundraising, allocation, and tracking to ensure precision and efficiency.
blockChainSecSub: Our platform is protected by a centralized blockchain network, providing transparency, speed, and security to ensure data integrity and confidentiality in all transactions.
decisionSupportToolsSub: We offer advanced tools to aid decision-making for businesses and investors, ensuring informed decisions and successful outcomes.
discoverSub: An innovative platform for Crowdfunding, Crowd-investing, and Exchange, using cutting-edge technologies.
meetOurTeamSub: Our team of diverse professionals is dedicated to revolutionizing fintech and empowering businesses and investors. Meet the talented individuals behind Rabeh's success.
register: Register on the Rabeh platform to create your profile and access powerful campaign tools.
craftCampaign: Create a compelling project with clear goals, descriptions, and engaging visuals.
activateCampaign: Promote your campaign via social media, email, and other marketing channels after activation.
interactWithBackers: Interact with backers, answer questions, and provide updates to keep them invested.
adjustStrategy: Adjust strategies based on feedback and analytics to maximize your campaign's success.
secureFunds: Secure the funds, execute your project, and keep backers informed of your progress.
signUpPoint: Register on Rabeh and start exploring investment opportunities.
exploreCampaigns: Discover a variety of campaigns across different industries and sectors.
examineProjects: Analyze project descriptions, goals, business plans, and risks for informed investment decisions.
supportProjects: Invest in projects that align with your interests and goals securely through our platform.
trackInvestments: Stay updated with your investments' progress and project milestones.
provideFeedback: Offer feedback or support to projects you’ve invested in, if desired.
registerAsConsultant: Register as a consultant on the Rabeh platform to offer your expertise.
reviewProposals: Review project proposals and provide valuable feedback and advice.
workWithCreators: Collaborate with campaign creators to refine strategies and boost success chances.
enhanceCampaigns: Help entrepreneurs enhance their campaigns and fundraising strategies.
trackProgress: Track the progress of campaigns you support and provide ongoing assistance as needed.
connectAndExpand: Connect with entrepreneurs and investors to expand your professional network and opportunities.
rabehDescription: Rabeh is an innovative fintech platform transforming the financial and crowdfunding landscape.
createLandingPages: Easily create high-converting landing pages with Rabeh's intuitive tools.
rabehDescriptionBuss: Rabeh integrates fintech solutions into every part of the financial process, revolutionizing the experience for businesses and investors.
welcomeConsultants: Welcome to the consultants in the Rabeh community.
onlinePaymentCompanies: Our platform enables seamless internet-based transactions.
joinSecuredPayment: Join millions of users benefiting from our secure payment system.
largestAdopters: Adopted by users who prioritize efficiency and security in their transactions.
onlinePaymentSystem: Our online payment system provides modern alternatives to traditional transactions.
createCulture: Foster a culture of financial transparency and discipline.
gainVisibility: Gain real-time insights and streamline global spending with increased accountability.
makeItEasy: Simplify processes, ensuring compliance across cards, reimbursements, and payments.
autoGenerate: Auto-generate receipts with clear policies and purposes, shown in both local and foreign currencies.
manageClients: Manage your clients effortlessly with a single sign-in and professional access.
accessSalesMaterials: Access sales materials and co-branded resources.
brexAPI: Leverage the Brex API for seamless payment integration and reporting.
consolidateAR: Consolidate revenue from all channels for simpler financial management.
trackAndAllocate: Monitor services and allocate funds in real-time, ensuring seamless client experiences.
travelAgencyTool: Monitor and allocate funds in real-time for investment projects, ensuring a smooth experience for investors.
groupManagementFeatures: For businesses managing multiple investment projects, RABEH provides real-time portfolio management tools. Users can efficiently track investment performance, manage project details, and receive instant updates.
joinTheTeam: Join a talented global team working on cutting-edge financial software.
weWouldLoveToHear: We'd love to hear from you! Please fill out the form below.
isThereFreeTrial: Do you offer a free trial?
pricingScalesWithCompany: Absolutely! Our pricing is flexible. Contact us to customize your plan.
canIChangePlanLater: Can I change my plan later?
refundPolicy: You can cancel your plan anytime, and we’ll refund any unused portion.
canAddInfoToInvoice: Can additional info be added to an invoice?
addInfoToInvoiceExplanation: Currently, the only way to add information is by adding it to the workspace name.
billingDetails: Our pricing is workspace-based, allowing flexibility across free and paid workspaces.
changeEmail: How do I change my account email?
changeEmailInstructions: Update your email by visiting rabeh.sa/account from a laptop or desktop.
globalOffices: Our teams are based across multiple global offices.
friendlyTeam: Our friendly team is ready to assist you.
questionsOrQueries: Have any questions? Get in touch with us!

buss1: which is approximately 56% of the consumer population of the US

buss3: The online payment system offers electronic alternatives to traditional
testimonial1: Thanks to Rabeh, I was able to expand my small business beyond my wildest dreams. The exposure and funding we received through their platform were game-changers. The entire process was smooth, and the Rabeh team was always there to guide us.
testimonial2: Rabeh helped our non-profit organization raise the necessary funds to launch our community project. Their platform made it easy to reach out to potential donors and share our mission. We couldn't have done it without their amazing support!
testimonial3: As an app developer, securing funding can be challenging. Rabeh made it possible for us to get the backing we needed to launch our app successfully. The platform's reach and the team's dedication were key to our fundraising success.
testimonial4: Rabeh was the perfect partner for our crowdfunding campaign. The exposure and support we received helped us surpass our funding goals. Their commitment to helping innovators like us is evident in every step of the process.
testimonial5: Rabeh provided the platform and resources we needed to bring our social enterprise to life. Their team was supportive and responsive, and the crowdfunding campaign exceeded our expectations. We're now making a positive impact, thanks to Rabeh.

privacySubtitle: Welcome to RABEH. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information in compliance with Saudi Arabian laws, including the Saudi Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL), and applicable international regulations.
enterEmailtoReset: Enter your email address, and we will send a verification code to your email
